descriptionlist.description:
WiFiReminder is a tweak for everyone!

Who hasnâ€™t been in a situation where you need to turn off your Wi-Fi connection to either save battery or to quickly switch from a slow Wi-Fi to LTE just to show someone something or to find something quickly?

If you ever see yourself in this situation, this is certainly your tweak!

WiFiReminder will notify you after a designated amount of time, and give you the ability to not waste mobile data when you could be using your home Wi-Fi!
You have to try it out!

Options to configure in settings.
